duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the Installation, Modification, Operations and Repair of Large Earth Terminal Systems.
Analyze and Monitor system operation and correct system malfunctions.
Maintain system health and work collaboratively with customers and peers.
Work in a non-traditional 12-hour shift including day, night, weekends, and holidays as per schedule dictates.
Enter into a formal certification process and obtain and maintain certifications for ground terminal operations.
Ability to work on operational systems within an Operational and Maintenance (O&M) industry.
Work in a multi-tasking changing environment under general direction and distinguish the difference between colors on a computer monitor.

education_certification.credential: University Degree or equivalent experience and minimum 2 years of prior relevant experience.
Active - in-scope U.S. TS/SCI security clearance with C.I. polygraph.
